title: Gazebo crash when running long time in ubuntu in vmware

content.raw:
Hi, Im using Gazebo 2.2.3 in ubuntu 14.04 LTS in VMWare. 

I add some indoor scene models and kinect models. I use ROS topic get simulated color and depth images. 
In most cases it works well. But when Gazebo running long time(about 2 hours), sometimes it will crash, or get wrong simulated frames or kinect object poses. 

Whats wrong with it? Can you help me solve the problem? Thanks in advance!
